component.name: Steam Shortcut Manager
component.summary: Manage non-Steam game shortcuts and artwork in your Steam library.

description.p: Steam Shortcut Manager is a command-line tool that allows users to easily add, remove, and check for non-Steam game shortcuts in their Steam library. It also features automatic generation and assignment of various Steam grid artwork types, including hero banners, grid images, portraits, icons, and logos.

This tool is particularly useful for integrating games from other launchers or emulated games into the Steam interface with proper visuals. It can also apply custom branding (watermark) to the generated artwork.

ul.li: Add, remove, and check non-Steam game shortcuts.
Automatic generation of Steam grid artwork (header, hero, portrait, icon, logo).
Customizable artwork backgrounds and optional watermark branding.
